_header: The bishop Scrope that was so wise
Subjects: Scrope, Richard le, archbishop of York; carols, political; political poems
_description: Carol on the death of Archbishop Scrope — four quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Hay hay hay hay / Thynke on whitson monday’

CamTCC652.First Lines:
The bysshop Scrope that was so wysenowe is he dede and lowe he
                    lyse…
CamTCC652.Last Lines:
…to hevyns blys that lastys ayHay hay hay hay thynke on
                    Whitsonmonday
